segments.text: The fractions.gcd function in Python computes the greatest common divisor of two numbers. So in C, we need a function to compute GCD of two numbers, then iteratively compute the GCD of the current result with the next element.

segments.text:
So, the algorithm in C would be:

Initialize the result as the first element of the array. Then loop through each subsequent element, compute the GCD of the current result and the next element, and update the result.
